title: fangandcallan.github.io
text:
#CHALLANGE

library(tidyverse)
billboard
billboard %>%
  pivot_longer(cols = starts_with("wk"), 
               names_to = "week", 
               values_to = "rank", 
               values_drop_na = FALSE) %>%
  mutate(week = parse_number(week)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = week, y = rank, group = 1)) +
  geom_line()


cms_patient_experience
result <- cms_patient_experience %>%
  pivot_wider(
    id_cols = starts_with("org"),
    names_from = measure_cd,
    values_from = prf_rate
  )

result

title: The Eyes You’ll Shut Forever
Project1
text:
#Death Penalty in Texas and The Last Words

#I have 2 datasets I'm planning to use, both of which are data from Texas and have offender's last words.
#1. The offenders and their victim specs. 
#2. Offender's height and weight.
